channel.title: glazeruns TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

item.title: When you're married to an ultrarunner, things you might have to do will test that "for worse" statement. If anyone doubted how much my wife loves me, I have video proof. Kt tape is my duct tape, I use it for everything. Nipple chaffing, friction reduction
item.description: When you're married to an ultrarunner, things you might have to do will test that "for worse" statement. If anyone doubted how much my wife loves me, I have video proof. Kt tape is my duct tape, I use it for everything. Nipple chaffing, friction reduction

item.title: Your life is worth fighting for. Every single one of us has a purpose, even if it feels lost in the moment. If you’re struggling, please reach out. Whether it’s to a friend, a family member, or a professional, there’s no shame in asking for help. There ar

item.title: YMCA Stairclimb 2024. 3rd place firefighter. 8th place overall in the hero category. Wore all my gear and PR'd my time by 90 seconds. Finish time 22 minutes 02 seconds for 75 flights with 75 pounds of gear. I've been doing this climb since I was a probati
item.description: YMCA Stairclimb 2024. 3rd place firefighter. 8th place overall in the hero category. Wore all my gear and PR'd my time by 90 seconds. Finish time 22 minutes 02 seconds for 75 flights with 75 pounds of gear. I've been doing this climb since I was a probati

item.title: Moab 240 miler in 3 days. There's a lot of packing and planning involved when you have 12 dropbags. So scared. My body is in a taper tantrum. I've got to trust the process. Looking forward to seeing everyone out there. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #
item.description: Moab 240 miler in 3 days. There's a lot of packing and planning involved when you have 12 dropbags. So scared. My body is in a taper tantrum. I've got to trust the process. Looking forward to seeing everyone out there. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #

item.title: Running 240 miles solo and unsupported takes a lot of planning. I have to predict when I'll reach each aid station and what I’ll need when I get there. Hitting an aid station at 10,000 feet at 2am is a completely different situation than arriving at 2pm.
item.description: Running 240 miles solo and unsupported takes a lot of planning. I have to predict when I'll reach each aid station and what I’ll need when I get there. Hitting an aid station at 10,000 feet at 2am is a completely different situation than arriving at 2pm.

item.title: I forgot a couple things Lube - salty britches and a glide stick Salt pills My shoes are Hoka Challengers Socks are Feetures Merino 10s Ice bandana Sun screen As always, not sponsored. Just what I use currently. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #Moab240
item.description: I forgot a couple things Lube - salty britches and a glide stick Salt pills My shoes are Hoka Challengers Socks are Feetures Merino 10s Ice bandana Sun screen As always, not sponsored. Just what I use currently. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #Moab240

item.title: I'm heartbroken to share that I didn’t finish Moab again. Two attempts, two failures. I’m devastated and disappointed. This time, I ended up with heat stroke—stopped sweating, full body cramping, chest pain, severe dehydration, and went 20 hours without p
item.description: I'm heartbroken to share that I didn’t finish Moab again. Two attempts, two failures. I’m devastated and disappointed. This time, I ended up with heat stroke—stopped sweating, full body cramping, chest pain, severe dehydration, and went 20 hours without p

item.title: I'm sad. #Moab240 #runtok #dnf

item.title: When someone fails at something they’ve poured their heart into, it’s easy for others to swoop in with advice on how they ‘could’ve succeeded.’ They knew better, right? They cheer in your defeat, using your struggle to validate their own fears. It’s why p

item.title: I almost died attempting to run 240 miles. Let me take you through the experience. The race was going well, everything was going according to plan. I left the last aid station feeling good, with only one minor concern—I hadn’t peed in a while. But I was d

item.title: Moab 240 miler warned me. I said the pledge. Glad I didn't die, though. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #Moab240 #Ultrarunner #Ultramarathon #runtok

item.title: A moment I'll never forget. Having these Battalion Chief bugles pinned on by my better half - the woman who has been my rock. No accomplishment means anything without you by my side. From probationary firefighter to Battalion Chief, this path has been bui
item.description: A moment I'll never forget. Having these Battalion Chief bugles pinned on by my better half - the woman who has been my rock. No accomplishment means anything without you by my side. From probationary firefighter to Battalion Chief, this path has been bui

item.title: A mustache can start conversations that save lives. 🧔 This Movember isn't just about growing facial hair – it's about growing awareness. Prostate cancer is the #1 cancer risk for firefighters, but here's the hope: caught early, it's highly treatable. Talk
item.description: A mustache can start conversations that save lives. 🧔 This Movember isn't just about growing facial hair – it's about growing awareness. Prostate cancer is the #1 cancer risk for firefighters, but here's the hope: caught early, it's highly treatable. Talk

item.title: NYC Marathon ✅️ Congratulations to Lauren on her marathon PR That was hard. Beautiful weather, electric spectators, wonderful volunteers, perfect organization. So much fun in 26 miles. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #NYCMarathon #runtok
item.description: NYC Marathon ✅️ Congratulations to Lauren on her marathon PR That was hard. Beautiful weather, electric spectators, wonderful volunteers, perfect organization. So much fun in 26 miles. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #NYCMarathon #runtok

item.title: Winter runs often mean logging miles in the dark, making a reliable headlamp essential. I rely on the Petzl Iko Core, a headlamp that combines impressive specs with practical features. Not sponsored, just what I use. **Brightness and Modes:** The Iko Core
item.description: Winter runs often mean logging miles in the dark, making a reliable headlamp essential. I rely on the Petzl Iko Core, a headlamp that combines impressive specs with practical features. Not sponsored, just what I use. **Brightness and Modes:** The Iko Core

item.title: I am not sponsored. This is just what I use. I bought this light for full price without a discount and have no relationship with Ultraspire. Running ultramarathons at night, especially on rugged trails, demands optimal visibility without added fatigue. T
item.description: I am not sponsored. This is just what I use. I bought this light for full price without a discount and have no relationship with Ultraspire. Running ultramarathons at night, especially on rugged trails, demands optimal visibility without added fatigue. T

item.title: The loudest mayday call is often the one that's never spoken. Today, I'm speaking it for all of us. Whether you wear a badge or not, this message is for you. Pain doesn't discriminate between uniforms and civilian clothes. Neither should help. FOR EVERYON
item.description: The loudest mayday call is often the one that's never spoken. Today, I'm speaking it for all of us. Whether you wear a badge or not, this message is for you. Pain doesn't discriminate between uniforms and civilian clothes. Neither should help. FOR EVERYON

item.title: Leadville 100 miler lottery opens on December 1st. If you want to run it, this is your opportunity to enter. It's an amazing race. #runtok #ultramarathon #leadville100

item.title: Good. More time to train. The lottery gods are unhappy with me again. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #westernstates100#hardrock100

item.title: Crazy Mountain 100 opens today at 5am PST. This was my favorite American race of 2024. I highly recommend it. It's a rugged, remote, difficult, beautiful mountain race. Hope to see you there. Smile, or you're doing it wrong #crazymountain100 #ultramarath
item.description: Crazy Mountain 100 opens today at 5am PST. This was my favorite American race of 2024. I highly recommend it. It's a rugged, remote, difficult, beautiful mountain race. Hope to see you there. Smile, or you're doing it wrong #crazymountain100 #ultramarath

item.title: Want to meet this beautiful cow? UTMB lottery opens today. It's an amazing 170km race through the Alps of France, Italy, and Switzerland. It follows the TMB trail. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #Ultrarunner #utmb
item.description: Want to meet this beautiful cow? UTMB lottery opens today. It's an amazing 170km race through the Alps of France, Italy, and Switzerland. It follows the TMB trail. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #Ultrarunner #utmb

item.title: Tons of Free and Paid resources available. You are not alone. Free Resources National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (U.S.) Dial: 988 Website: 988lifeline.org Offers free, confidential support 24/7. Crisis Text Line Text: HOME to 741741 (U.S. and Canada) Web
item.description: Tons of Free and Paid resources available. You are not alone. Free Resources National Suicide Prevention Lifeline (U.S.) Dial: 988 Website: 988lifeline.org Offers free, confidential support 24/7. Crisis Text Line Text: HOME to 741741 (U.S. and Canada) Web

item.title: When wildfires rage across California, you might wonder: How do fire departments help fight massive fires without leaving their own cities unprotected? The answer lies in the Fire Mutual Aid System—a system built on coordination, teamwork, and strategy. 🌟

item.title: Coldwater Rumble 100 miler in the morning. I like a fresh pair shoes for every ultramarathon. I put a couple miles on them just to make sure the laces are okay. Then I destroy them. It gets expensive. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.
item.description: Coldwater Rumble 100 miler in the morning. I like a fresh pair shoes for every ultramarathon. I put a couple miles on them just to make sure the laces are okay. Then I destroy them. It gets expensive. Smile, or you're doing it wrong.

item.title: Coldwater Rumble 100 miler starts at 7am in Goodyear, Arizona. When I finish on Sunday, TikTok will be no longer. thanks for all the support. #runtok #ultrarunner #coldwaterrumble

item.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
